definition: to propose (for a job)/to nominate/to recommend
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: He was proposed as a candidate for the headmaster.
sentences.chinese: 他被薦舉爲校長候選人。

definition: Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
